column1: '''''The Tolkien Calendar 1989''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Unwin Hyman
column2: Unwin Paperbacks]] on [[25 August]] [[1988]]. It features art by [[Roger Garland]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]'', ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Silmarillion]]'' and ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.
